name: CoolTool
overview:
CoolTool is a comprehensive web-based platform and Marketplace, connecting research buyers, market research agencies, respondent panel providers and consultants.

CoolTool provides great opportunities to make or save money using all benefits of digital technologies for market research industry:

Powerful set of self service web-based tools for different kinds of projects: • Online surveys • Surveys on mobile devices & tablets • Virtual interviewer (IVR) surveys

Revolutionary Marketplace to sell & buy any research services worldwide: • Online panels • Methodologies • Questionnaires • Ad-hoc research & consultancy services • Translation and other services

Platform for collaborating with your Clients and Partners: • Individual privileges for Clients & Partners • Real-time automated reports • Built-in billing & escrow system • Integrated messaging
